content:
The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel-General Alexander Sirsky showed how Ukrainian soldiers destroy the personnel and military equipment of the invaders.

About this heWritingand published the appropriate video on its Facebook page.

“Bright episodes of enemy equipment and weapons. Our fighters do not allow the enemy to realize his plans, ”Alexander Sirsky emphasized.

In particular, the video shows how skillfully our warriors resist the invaders.

As reported by the Armyinform, the forces of defense have shown howdestroy the assault groupsVorog drones.
title: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine showed how our soldiers destroy enemy equipment
description: He wrote about it and published the appropriate video on his Facebook page. ...
author: Army Inform
